name: The Falling Of The Easter Eggs
name_original: The Falling Of The Easter Eggs
description:
Welcome to the Falling of the Easter Eggs Universe, the first game specially designed for Easter.
  
Come try your luck and try to get the best score. 
  
               The principle of the game is very simple: collect with your basket the good Easter eggs but beware of eggs trapped, they will make you lose the game! But whoever says bad egg necessarily says bonus because different types of bonus are present to help you make the best score! In addition, the more time passes and the speed of the game will increase.
  
               Good luck to everyone!
